short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Code Copier - Extension to copy contents inside <code> and <pre> tags with right click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox extension to copy contents inside <code> and <pre> tags with right click.

Fetures:
* Right click on <code> and <pre> tags to copy
* Up to 10 copy history
* Go back to the website where the code snippets from
* Disable plugin on user defined host names

Other Information:
* Firefox Version: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/code-copier/
* Source code available at https://github.com/icelam/code-copier.
